description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 4/19/2006

Brooke is furious with Ridge for surprising her with a visit from her father. Brooke makes it pretty clear to both of them that she wants nothing to do with either of the two men. Stephen pleads with Brooke to hate him, but please just let Ridge in her life. Massimo convinces Megan to continue with their scheme and he will thank her properly in time. Nick informs Jackie that he is working on getting her out of prison hopefully by the following day.
captions: well the beautiful 47 89 3 7 2006

what kind of a man does that

to keep her in jail what I was

are you trying to remind me that there's

resolve feelings issues of abandonment
your old girl when he walked out on my

brookies your father
I wouldn't have brought him here if I
didn't think this was so important
Brooke our future is riding on you
hearing what he has to say to you I'm
asking you now please please listen to

I don't need to listen to him Ridge I
know exactly what he did to me and to my

mom she had to work day and night to try
to support us do you know why we called
my brother storm because of all the
anger that he carried around inside of
him because of what you did to him I was

sisters that man took my childhood away
he changed everything
just like I did Brooke when your father

thought you dealt with all these issues
all the pain and the anger of being

it's clearly you didn't though and until

that's why I brought Stephen here you

all this time you thought it was

Jeff here you are I had to find out how

what was happening in your life you
don't answer my calls my letters come

after what you did to me what did you

out
I believe your father is a changed man
listen to what he has to say he's he's

Brook I was wrong
and I can't ask for your forgiveness
because I've caused too much pain for

and maybe maybe some of the damage I've

and you can live the life you were meant

I'll get my mother out

I am surely becoming a success at
